oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.attachments.v2.ui.managed
Class AttachmentViewBean

java.lang.Object
  oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.attachments.v2.ui.managed.AttachmentViewBean
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, AttachmentController
public final class AttachmentViewBean
extends java.lang.Object
implements AttachmentController, java.io.Serializable

The controller and interface to the model for the Attachments V2 Component.

Since:
11.1.1.7.4

Constructor Detail

AttachmentViewBean

public AttachmentViewBean(AttachmentViewModel model,
                          java.lang.String confirmDelete,
                          java.lang.String defaultCategory,
                          java.lang.String fieldRenderOff)
Bean constructor.

Parameters:
model - the model to store the row selection,etc data in.
confirmDelete - the value of the confirm delete attribute from the component.
defaultCategory - the default category attribute value on the component.
fieldRenderOff - allow for the ATTACHEDBY, ATTACHEDDATE, SHARED, DESCRIPTION, CHECKEDOUTBY, LASTUPDATEDATE, LASTUPDATEBY fields to be switched off.

confirmOrProcessSingleDelete

public void confirmOrProcessSingleDelete(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent event)
Action listener for when the user clicks the delete button on a particular row. This will display a popup asking for whether to delete (if component is configured to ask) or will just delete the row. The UIComponent triggering the event must have the row index in an attribute called 'attIdx'..

Specified by:
confirmOrProcessSingleDelete in interface AttachmentController
Parameters:
event - the UIComponent event.
